

   --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
             README file for JS Engine Switcher: V8 for Windows x64 v3.9.0

   --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

           Copyright (c) 2013-2020 Andrey Taritsyn - http://www.taritsyn.ru


   ===========
   DESCRIPTION
   ===========
   This package is deprecated. Instead, it is recommended to use a
   'Microsoft.ClearScript.V8.Native.win-x64' package.

   =============
   RELEASE NOTES
   =============
   Microsoft ClearScript.V8 was updated to version 7.0 (support of V8 version
   8.7.220.25).

   =============
   DOCUMENTATION
   =============
   See documentation on GitHub -
   http://github.com/Taritsyn/JavaScriptEngineSwitcher
